it.escape.core.server.view.sockspecific

Class SocketCommunication

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.escape.core.server.view.MessagingChannelStrings
        • it.escape.core.server.view.sockspecific.SocketCommunication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessagingHead, MessagingChannelInterface, MessagingTail

    public class SocketCommunication
extends MessagingChannelStrings
    A MessagingChannelStrings which make use of a socket. The socket is opened / closed[1] elsewhere, we only make use of it. [1] but we can trigger its termination
    Author:
    michele

      • killConnection

        public void killConnection()
        Once we have closed the output stream, the Socket will stop working. The Connection thread will sense it, and do all the required cleanup.
